mapper.insert: insert into sys_members ( parent_card, card, name, phone, status, card_type, is_admin, sex, create_by, remark, deposit, repair, share_ratio, rebate_ratio, is_pump, is_cash, is_settlement, is_out, is_bill, password, baccarat_rolling_ratio_chip, baccarat_rolling_ratio_cash, dragon_tiger_ratio_chip, dragon_tiger_ratio_cash, create_time )values( #{parentCard}, #{card}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{cardType}, #{isAdmin}, #{sex}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, #{deposit}, #{repair}, #{shareRatio}, #{rebateRatio}, #{isPump}, #{isCash}, #{isSettlement}, #{isOut}, #{isBill}, #{password}, #{baccaratRollingRatioChip}, #{baccaratRollingRatioCash}, #{dragonTigerRatioChip}, #{dragonTigerRatioCash}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select deposit, repair, share_ratio shareRatio, rebate_ratio rebateRatio, is_pump isPump, is_cash isCash, is_settlement isSettlement, is_out isOut, baccarat_rolling_ratio_chip baccaratRollingRatioChip, baccarat_rolling_ratio_cash baccaratRollingRatioCash, dragon_tiger_ratio_chip dragonTigerRatioChip, dragon_tiger_ratio_cash dragonTigerRatioCash, chip as chip from sys_members where id = #{id}

select id,card,name, phone,status,card_type cardType,is_admin isAdmin,sex,create_by createBy, create_time createTime,remark,chip, is_cash as isCash, is_out as isOut,is_settlement as isSettlement from sys_members where card = #{card}

SELECT m.id AS userId, m.NAME AS userName, m.card AS card, m.chip AS chipAmount, m.is_cash AS isCash, m.is_out as isOut, m.remark, IFNULL(s.signed_amount,0) as signedAmount FROM sys_members m LEFT JOIN sys_signed_record s on s.card=m.card
AND m.is_admin = 0
AND m.card = #{card}
ORDER BY m.chip desc
